funding-source.institution: Met Office authors were supported by the Joint UK BEIS/Defra Met Office Hadley Centre Climate Programme (GA01101) and Public Weather Service. The UK National Environment Research Council (NERC) Projects/Programmes DEEP-C NE/K005480/1 (RA, CL, PH), HOSTACE NE/J020788/1 (DB), SMURPHS NE/N006054/1 (RA, CL, SJ) and ORCHESTRA NE/N018095/1 (AM, PH, SJ) funded or supported author contributions. MM was funded by Austrian Science Fund project P28818.
